name: Dachshunds IO (Opoly)
description:
DACHSHUNDS IO

Dachshunds IO is a fun, fast, canine property trading game that celebrates all Dachshunds. Play against your friend, friends, or AI (Artificial Intelligence). Spin, buy, and sell as you race around the Dachshunds IO board. Every time you buy the same color board spaces you achieve Dachshunds IO. The richest player wins the game!

Optional Features
* Change Player Names
* Leader boards
